parentDataList.nodeContext: "SELECT v.definition " + "FROM " + DBUtils.getQuotedIdentifier(sourceObject.getCatalog()) + ".DEFINITION_SCHEMA._V_VIEW v "+ "WHERE v.VIEWNAME=?"+ (schema != null ? " AND v.SCHEMA=?" : "")
